# Decision Map: Day 4-7
## M1_BOOTSEQ Phase | 2026-01-12 to 2026-01-15

**Document ID:** DECISION_MAP_DAY4_7_20260112
**Generated:** 2026-01-12T01:35:00Z

**Authority:** CEO-DIR-2026-035

---

## Decision Philosophy

> **Principle:** Observe, don't intervene.
>
> System is on track. Deviations are explained and expected.
> The most professional action is inaction when criteria are not yet measurable.

---

---

## Day-by-Day Decision Nodes

### Day 4: January 12 - First Review Window

**Type:** CHECKPOINT

| Input | Check | If Nominal | If Deviation |
|-------|-------|------------|--------------|
| ios001 split ingest | Crypto ran 01:00 UTC? | CONTINUE | DIAGNOSE (no escalation) |
| IOS-003-B | Cycles running? | CONTINUE | RESTART daemon |
| Regime sync | Latency <1h? | CONTINUE | ALERT if >4h |

**Expected:** All systems nominal
**Tripwire:** Any system offline >2h triggers STIG investigation
**CEO Action:** None required

---

### Day 5: January 13 - Calibration Assessment Begins

**Type:** DATA_COLLECTION

| Input | Check | If Nominal | If Deviation |
|-------|-------|------------|--------------|
| Outcome pairs | Count >0? | CONTINUE | Diagnose horizon mismatch |
| delta_log | Entries exist? | CONTINUE | Verify IOS-003-B running |
| Brier trend | Stable/improving? | CONTINUE | Flag if >0.05 increase |

**Expected:** Data accumulation continues
**Tripwire:** Brier >0.40 triggers documentation (not intervention)
**CEO Action:** None required

---

### Day 6: January 14 - Trend Confirmation

**Type:** TREND_ANALYSIS

| Input | Check | If Nominal | If Deviation |
|-------|-------|------------|--------------|
| Forecast volume | >800/day avg? | CONTINUE | Investigate FINN health |
| IOS-003-B variance | >0? | Value signal | Document null hypothesis |
| Outcome accumulation | Increasing? | CONTINUE | Document finding |

**Expected:** Clear trend data available
**Tripwire:** No new data for 24h triggers health check
**CEO Action:** None required

---

### Day 7: January 15 - Phase Gate (M1 -> M2)

**Type:** GATE_DECISION

| Outcome | Action | CEO Involvement |
|---------|--------|-----------------|
| All criteria MET | Recommend M2 transition | **APPROVAL REQUIRED** |
| Criteria partially MET | Extend M1 by 3 days | **NOTIFIED** |
| Criteria FAILED | Full diagnostic | **DECISION REQUIRED** |

**Expected:** Data-driven gate decision
**Tripwire:** Insufficient data = automatic 3-day extension (not failure)
**CEO Action:** Gate decision required

---

## Escalation Matrix

| Level | Name | Description | CEO Involvement |
|-------|------|-------------|-----------------|
| 0 | NOMINAL | All systems within bounds | None |
| 1 | DIAGNOSTIC | Deviation under investigation | None unless >4h |
| 2 | ATTENTION | Approaching threshold | Async notification |
| 3 | DECISION_REQUIRED | Gate decision needed | Synchronous decision |

---

## Trigger Definitions

### System Health Triggers

| ID | Trigger | Condition | Action | Level |
|----|---------|-----------|--------|-------|
| T1 | DAEMON_OFFLINE | Not responding >30min | Restart, log | 1 |
| T2 | DATA_STALE | No new data >2h (market hours) | Diagnose pipeline | 1 |
| T3 | GOVERNANCE_VIOLATION | Unauthorized fhq_governance write | **IMMEDIATE HALT** | 3 |

### Performance Triggers

| ID | Trigger | Condition | Action | Level |
|----|---------|-----------|--------|-------|
| P1 | BRIER_SPIKE | Daily Brier >0.50 | Document, flag | 1 |
| P2 | FORECAST_COLLAPSE | <500/day for 2 days | Investigate FINN | 2 |
| P3 | ZERO_OUTCOMES | 0 new pairs for 3 days | Audit horizons | 1 |

---

## Non-Intervention Principles

| Principle | Rule | Rationale |
|-----------|------|-----------|
| NO_PARAMETER_TUNING | Do not adjust thresholds during M1 | Clean baseline requires stability |
| NO_MODEL_CHANGES | Do not retrain/swap models | Calibration needs consistency |
| NO_EXPOSURE | Zero trading | Observation must be capital-neutral |
| DOCUMENT_DONT_FIX | Record deviations, don't correct | Understanding precedes optimization |

| Day | Date | Deliverables |
|-----|------|--------------|
| 4 | Jan 12 | ios001 split verification, IOS-003-B 24h status |
| 5 | Jan 13 | 48h delta analysis, Outcome pair audit |
| 6 | Jan 14 | Trend confirmation report, Day 7 gate prep |
| 7 | Jan 15 | Go/No-Go evaluation, M1 Exit Package OR Extension Request |
